mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_likes (b_id, u_id, status) VALUE (#{bId}, #{uId}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE board_likes SET status=#{status} WHERE u_id=#{uId} AND b_id=#{bId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM board_likes WHERE u_id=#{uId} AND b_id=#{bId}
mapper.select: SELECT count(CASE WHEN status ='like' THEN 1 END) as 'like', count(CASE WHEN status ='sad' THEN 1 END) as 'sad', count(CASE WHEN status ='best' THEN 1 END) as 'best', count(CASE WHEN status ='bad' THEN 1 END) as 'bad' FROM board_likes WHERE b_id={bId}
